settings.title: Why Frozen Dessert Supplies?
settings.text: Our purpose at Frozen Dessert Supplies is "Build People and Deliver Joy." That means that everything we do, from manufacturing to packaging to delivery, is to build you and your business and deliver joy to you. We also strive to build our employees and help them to be better people.

settings.title: What are your product made from?
settings.text: Our paper ice cream cups are made withFDA approved food-safe papercoated in a thin layer ofPE (Polyethylene). Our clear plastic cups, banana split boats, and plastic dome lids are made fromPET (Polyethylene Terephthalate). Our plastic spoons and straws are made fromPP (Polypropylene). Our eco-friendly ice cream cups are made fromFDA approved food-safe papercoated in a thin layer ofPLA (Polylactic Acid). PLA is plastic made from corn starch. Our eco-friendly spoons are also made from PLA. Our eco-friendly wooden spoons are made from FDA approvedsmooth birch wood.

custom_css: header {margin-top: auto; margin-bottom: auto; margin-right: 1rem; margin-left: -1rem;}
@media (min-width: 769px) {div {display: grid; grid-template-rows: auto auto; grid-template-columns: auto auto; column-gap: 2rem; } div > header {grid-column: 1 / -1; margin-bottom: 1rem; }}
div > div > div > button > :nth-child(2) {display: block; width: 14rem;}
div > div > div {display: flex; flex-direction: column;}
